Test

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • Test.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to launch the program that solves Line Balancing Problems

    It implements a graphical interface that shows input data and displays solutions in the same frame.

    Author:
    Ulises Martinez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Chromosome[] chromos
      A Chromosome array thet stores the chromosomes generated by the programs last iteration
      (package private) java.io.File file
      A File used to load/save data to/from the program
      private javax.swing.JFrame frame
      The program's main window.
      (package private) int generationCounter
      An int variable used to identify a chromosome's birth generation
      (package private) LBPParameters params
      A variable to store and retrieve the problem's parameters
      (package private) int[][] precedences
      An int array that stores each task's immediate predecessors
      (package private) double[] stdDev
      A double array that sores each task's time's standars deviation
      private long STime
      A long variable that stores the solution's global start time used to calculate a chromosome's computational time
      private javax.swing.JTable table
      A table in which the user inputs each task's data
      private javax.swing.JTable table_1
      A table to display chromos's data
      private javax.swing.JTable table_2
      A table to display a chromosome's solution to the Line Balancing Problem
      private int tasks
      An int variable that stores the amount of tasks that has the problem
      (package private) double[] times
      A double array that stores each task's mean completion time

      • configureTables

        public void configureTables(int chosen)
        A method to configure a table to its default parameters
        Parameters:
        chosen - - The value of the table to configure, where 0 is table, 1 is table_1 and 2 is table_2

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initialize the contents of the frame.

      • jumpstart

        public void jumpstart(java.lang.String filepath,
                      java.lang.String filename,
                      double time)
        Deprecated. -Only developed for testing purposes.
        A method used for testing a single problem under different parameters.

        It opens a "*.lbp" file, solves the problem under various parameters and stores the best solutions in a text file at the same location. It also takes a screenshot of the main window ath the end of each iteration using makeScreenshot(JFrame, String, String, String)

        Parameters:
        filepath - - A String value that identifies the path to the problem's file. It must end with an double inverted bar (\\). Example: "C:\\Users\\default\\Desktop\\"
        filename - - A String value that identifies the problem's data file. It must not include the extension. Example: "lbp_problem_1"
        time - - A double value that corresponds to the problem's cycle time

      • setParams

        public void setParams(int task)
        A method to calculate and set the optimal parameters to solve the given problem
        Parameters:
        task - - The amount of tasks un the problem

      • makeScreenshot

        public static final void makeScreenshot(javax.swing.JFrame argFrame,
                                        java.lang.String filename,
                                        java.lang.String filepath,
                                        java.lang.String identifier)
        A method to take a screenshot of one of the program's frames and store it as a "*.png" file
        Parameters:
        argFrame - - The frame of which the screenshot will be made
        filepath - - A String value that identifies the path to the problem's file. It must end with an double inverted bar (\\). Example: "C:\\Users\\default\\Desktop\\screenshots\\". The filepath must already exist; otherwise the screenshots will not be saved.
        filename - - The first part of the image's storage name. It identifies the problem solved.
        identifier - - An extra identifier to distinguish different screenshots that come from the same problem
